roleset.name: passionately aggressive

example.name: arg1
example.text: My specialty at college was bedroom design , and my parents ran a store selling curtains , though a time - honored store in my hometown , its profit margin is very limited since there are many brands and the competition is very fierce ,

roleset.note: FIERCE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7, comparison to 'fiery'. (from fierce.01-j)
